bwwExcerpt: Janet McTeer and Liev Schreiber star in a well-acted and visually gorgeous production directed by Josie Rourke, which originated at London's Donmar Warehouse, as aristocrats and former lovers La Marquise de Merteuil and Le Vicomte de Valmont, both masters at using sex and seduction as weapons of cruelty and sources of personal amusement.
